FuncDef: The display ospfv3 request-list command displays the statistics of the request list of OSPFv3.
CLIs: display ospfv3 [ <process-id> ] request-list [ statistics | { area { <area-id> | <area-id> } | peer <neighbor-id> | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } } * ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an process ID of OSPFv3.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays the statistics of the request list of OSPFv3.
-

Specifies an OSPFv3 area ID.
The value can be a decimal integer or in the IPv4 address format. The integer ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the router ID of a neighbor.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics of the request list of OSPFv3, run the display ospfv3 request-list command. The command output helps you diagnose faults.
